name: Lamina RPG - Prototype
description:
Lamina RPG is a simple action-adventure prototype build using my own game engine. The game engine is still in development.

This game allow edit all the heroes, units, skills, maps, dialogs and even the A.I behaviour with their JSON files. The configuration can be opened at 'Data' folder.

I'm planning build better game concepts with this engine soon at 2021, including a map editor.

Thank you for giving a chance to this prototype!
